title: Prostate Cancer
description:
Prostate cancer is cancer that occurs in a small walnut shape gland in men that produces the seminal fluid that nourishes and transports sperm.Prostate cancer is one of the most common types of cancer in men.Usually prostate cancer grows slowly and is initially confine to the prostate gland, where it may not cause serious harm. However, while some types of prostate cancer grow slowly and may need minimal or even no treatment, other types are aggressive and can spread quickly.
Prostate cancer that's detected early when it's still confine to the prostate gland has a better chance of successful treatment.
Make sure you will learn many things from this application. Please share this application with your friends if you care about their health.

title: Prostate Cancer
description:
Prostate cancer affects the prostate gland, the gland that produces some of the fluid in semen and plays a role in urine control in men.
The prostate gland is located below the bladder and in front of the rectum.

In the United States (U.S.), it is the most common cancer in men, but it is also treatable if found in the early stages.

In 2017, the American Cancer Society predicts that there will be around 161,360 new diagnoses of prostate cancer, and that around 26,730 fatalities will occur because of it.

Regular testing is crucial as the cancer needs to be diagnosed before metastasis.

Here are some key points about the prostate cancer. More detail is in the main article.
The prostate gland is part of the male reproductive system.
Prostate cancer is the most common cancer in men.
It is treatable if diagnosed early, before it spreads.
If symptoms appear, they include problems with urination.
Regular screening Is the best way to detect it in good time.

title: ProstateCheck
description:
Welcome to your personal ProstateCheck! 

1. The ProstateCheck-App supports men above the age of 45 to check their individual prostate health. 

2. The ProstateCheck-App helps you and your physician in the early detection of prostate cancer ensuring that overdiagnosis and overtreatment are prevented.

3. The ProstateCheck-App defines your prostate health as the probability to be free from cancer.

4. The ProstateCheck-App recommends to you and your physician your personalized maximum time frame until your next check up.

5. The ProstateCheck-App is based on the largest ever screening study performed in German speaking countries with a follow up time of 14 years. 

6. Your personal results are available in pdf format.

7. The ProstateCheck-App is developed by the Prostate Cancer Research Foundation Switzerland.

The ProstateCheck-App is based on scientific data derived from the largest prostate cancer screening study ever performed in German speaking countries with more than 10'000 participants and a follow up time of 14 years. 
This App provides you the necessary information on the disease frequency, on early detection and on the possible side effects of treatment. It gives you important recommendations about your prostate health and the maximum time frame until your next checkup.

title: IPCRC (Prostate Ca Calculator)
description:
Indonesian Prostate Cancer Risk Calculator (IPCRC) provides a risk calculation based on age, PSA level, prostate volume, and digital rectal examination (DRE) findings. It will help you decide whether to go for further tests and discussing the implications with your GP or hospital doctor. It is possible that prostate cancer will not be found even if you have an elevated PSA. However, it may be present even if your PSA level is low.

If you have doubts or questions about your health, you should always contact your GP or urologist. This is particularly important if you have questions which arise from the use of one or more of the prostate cancer risk calculators.

Please be aware that the Indonesian Prostate Cancer Risk Calculator (IPCRC) cannot be 100% accurate at predicting the presence or absence of prostate cancer. It is designed to help calculate your risk, not give a definitive diagnosis. It cannot be ruled out that the way the Indonesian Prostate Cancer Risk Calculator is used, or the indications given by it, are interpreted in a manner that is not appropriate. The creators of the Indonesian Prostate Cancer Risk Calculator (IPCRC) do not accept any responsibility in any respect.

========================================

Calculation used by Indonesian Prostate Cancer Risk Calculator (IPCRC) is copyrighted under Indonesian Urological Association, and has been published in Acta Med Indones. 2015 Apr;47(2):95-103. PMID26260551

Persons affiliated with this multicenter study :
Yuri P, Wangge G, Abshari F, Satjakoesoemah Al, Perdana NR, Wijaya CD, Tansol C, Tigor A, Safriadi F, Kadar DD, Warli SM, Rochadi S, Danarto, Hakim L, Djatisoesanto W, Hardjowijoto S, Mochtar CA, Umbas R, Hamid AR

title: Inflammation prostate gland
description:
Prostatitis is an inflammation of the prostate – the main auxiliary gland of the male body.
Inflammation of the prostate is considered one of the most common urological diseases in men. According to statistics, prostatitis affects up to 50 % of men aged 25-50 years. The incidence of prostatitis increases with age and reaches 55-80%.
Today, this disease is increasingly common in men who are at the most active age, in sexual and labor relations. Symptoms of chronic prostatitis have a very significant impact on the quality of life, which also explains significant psychological and social problems in working-age men with prostatitis.

The development of prostatitis is associated with the penetration of sexually transmitted infections, which is facilitated by the anatomical location of the prostate.
The prostate gland is located in the pelvic region above the bladder, it circularly surrounds the neck of the bladder and the initial part of the urethra.

Infectious and inflammatory process in the prostate can occur for many reasons and with the assistance of concomitant factors.
Pathogens of the infectious form of prostatitis are bacteria, viruses, Mycoplasma, Ureaplasma, chlamydia, Trichomonas, fungi. Infections, mainly sexually transmitted infections, from the bladder, urethra, rectum, through the blood and lymphatic vessels of the pelvis enter the prostate.

title: Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation
description:
"Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation" is an app to help medical doctor or urologist to predict pathological stage of prostate cancer patients based on commonly available preoperative data (serum prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level, clinical stage, and biopsy Gleason score). For decades, urologists around the world have relied on the tables for counseling patients preoperatively and for surgical planning.

Why should you choose "Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation"?
🔸 Based on the latest Partin Tables nomogram.
🔸 Simple and very easy to use.
🔸 Accurate and precise calculation. 
🔸 Prediction of the pathological stage of prostate cancer.
🔸 It is totally free. Download now!

Around 93% of newly diagnosed prostate cancer patients present with localized or regional disease. The use of "Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation" app may shift toward identifying men with intermediate-risk to high-risk disease for whom the ratio of treatment benefit to harm may be greatest, or to identify men with low-risk to intermediate-risk disease who may benefit from active surveillance. "Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation" app is based on the latest Partin nomogram adapted from Eifler, et al. 2012. The results were from an analysis of 5629 men treated with prostatectomy (without additional therapy) between 2006 and 2011 at the Johns Hopkins Hospital. In this app, you should input patient's information regarding clinical stage, serum PSA, and gleason score. "Urology Partin Tables: Prostate Cancer Evaluation" app will then calculate the probability of pathological stage (organ confined, extraprotastic extension, seminal vesicle involvement, and lymph node involvement).

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com

title: Treatment of prostatitis in men
description:
Before you get acquainted with the features of treating prostatitis in men with medications at home, as well as with unconventional therapy, you need to understand the causes of this disease. The main reason lies in the infection in the prostate gland, and this, in turn, is facilitated by the location of this organ in the pelvis. The main pathways of infection in the prostate gland should be highlighted:

Downward. In this case, the infection enters the prostate along with urine.
Ascendant. The infection enters the prostate through the urethra.
Hematogenous. In this situation, the infection enters the prostate along with the blood flow.
Lymphogenic In this case, the infection enters the prostate along with lymph flow.
The main causes, as well as risk factors for prostatitis in the stronger sex are as follows:

A sedentary, sedentary lifestyle, as well as lack of physical activity. Because of this, there is stagnation of blood in the prostate.
Violation of the usual rhythm of sexual activity. The fact is that irregular sexual acts, as well as prolonged abstinence can provoke the development of this disease.
Hypothermia that can occur during adolescence, childhood, or adulthood. This is especially true in cases where the corresponding part of the man’s body is supercooled.
Sexually transmitted diseases, such as trichomoniasis, chlamydia, gonorrhea, or gardnerellosis.
Injury to pelvic organs or tissues.
A weakened immune system in patients in childhood, adolescence or adulthood.
Unbalanced diet, which should include sweet, fatty and fried foods. Also, excessive consumption of alcoholic beverages contributes to the development of prostatitis.
All of the above conditions can cause microbes to enter the prostate, as well as provoke a stagnant process in the body, worsen the blood supply to the prostate gland, which in turn will lead to an increase in the number of harmful microorganisms and the progression of the inflammatory process. For this reason, it is necessary to treat this disease on time so that complications never again bother the man.

title: Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density
description:
"Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app is designed to help health professional to assess patients with prostate enlargement (BPH or prostate cancer). "Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app will help to estimate prostate volume and prostate specific antigen (PSA) density. Tumor volume is used, along with the Gleason Score, to prognosticate prostate cancer recurrence. PSA density helps distinguish between BPH and prostate cancer and determine the need for prostate biopsy.

Why should you choose "Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density"?
🔸 Simple and very easy to use.
🔸 Accurate and precise calculation of prostate volume and PSA density.
🔸 There are two volume formulas to calculate prostate volume, namely ellipsoid and bullet volume.
🔸 Calculation of PSA density to determine the need for prostate biopsy.
🔸 It is totally free. Download now!

"Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app could calculate prostate volume with two formulas, especially ellipsoid volume and bullet volume. This feature is very useful for physician in urology clinic when handling patients with benign prostate hyperplasia (BPH) or prostate cancer. The normal prostate volume is 15 to 30 cc. Men with prostate volume larger than 30 cc are more likely to be diagnosed with BPH or prostate cancer. "Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app is also a practical medical calculator to calculate PSA density. PSA density is PSA divided by prostate volume. PSA density is said to be superior than PSA alone in detecting prostate cancer.

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com
descriptionHTML:
"Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app is designed to help health professional to assess patients with prostate enlargement (BPH or prostate cancer). "Urology Prostate Calculator: Volume and Density" app will help to estimate prostate volume and prostate specific antigen (PSA) density. Tumor volume is used, along with the Gleason Score, to prognosticate prostate cancer recurrence. PSA density helps distinguish between BPH and prostate cancer and determine the need for prostate biopsy.

title: Ned for Prostate Cancer
description:
Ned, short for "No Evident Disease”, is a cross-platform app for prostate cancer survivors. Ned promotes self-care by informing you directly of your Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) results and providing you with a personalized view of your symptoms. It also supports clinical decision-making by providing your physicians with your PSA results and symptoms in real-time. You can also share Ned with a caregiver or a loved one so they can stay informed about your health.

Key Features: 

- Gives you direct access to your lab results
- Allows your healthcare providers to make more informed and timely clinical decisions  
- Provides a personalized view of your lab results and symptoms over time 
- Delivers current news on maintaining a healthy lifestyle and suggests nearby events 
related to prostate cancer survivorship

title: Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer
description:
"Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer" is a medical mobile app designed for health practitioner especially in Urology department. "Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer" app will calculate several measurements regarding prostate specific antigen (PSA). The PSA test is used primarily to screen for prostate cancer. PSA is a protein produced by both cancerous and noncancerous tissue in the prostate. "Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer" will enable urologist to calculate PSA density (PSAD), PSA doubling time (PSADT), and PSA age volume (PSA-AV).

There are several features of "Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer", namely:
🔸 Simple and very easy to use app for urologist.
🔸 Precise calculation of PSA density, doubling time, and age volume.
🔸 Useful for management of prostate cancer patient.
🔸 It is totally free. Download now!

Screening for prostate cancer using prostate-specific antigen (PSA) alone leads to unnecessary biopsy and overdiagnosis. PSA density is easily accessible. PSA density was calculated by dividing serum PSA concentration by gland volume. Using a PSA density cutoff of 0.15 as recommended in the literature enhanced specificity but at the cost of missing half of the tumors.

PSA doubling time (PSADT) has been studied as a survival measure in prostate cancer. PSA doubling time, or the change in PSA level over time, has emerged as a useful predictive marker for assessing disease outcome in prostate cancer. PSA doubling time can be an indicator of biochemical and clinical progression of prostate cancer. This "Urology PSA Calculator Pro - Prostate Cancer" app predicts the changes in PSA levels over time.

The PSA-age volume (PSA-AV) score was calculated by multiplying the age and prostate volume and then dividing the total by the prebiopsy PSA level. A PSA-AV score less than 700 had a sensitivity and specificity of 95% and 15%, respectively to predict prostate cancer. The PSA-AV score was more sensitive in younger patients and in patients with a small prostate volume.

title: Prostata-Remedios Naturales
description: El cuerpo del hombre que suele traer problemas. La próstata forma parte de los órganos reproductores del hombre. Tiene aproximadamente el tamaño de una nuez y rodea la uretra, el tubo ubicado justo debajo de la vejiga. La uretra tiene dos funciones. La primera es pasar la orina desde la vejiga al orinar. La segunda es pasar el semen durante la eyaculación.El semen es una mezcla de esperma y líquido producido en la próstata. En los hombres menores de 50 años, el problema más común de la próstata es la prostatitis. En los hombres mayores de 50 años, el problema más común de la próstata es el agrandamiento de la próstata o BPH.

title: Prostate Cancer Conference 16
description:
APCC 2016 is the official mobile App for the 17th Asia-Pacific Prostate Cancer Conference 2016.

The mobile App allows you to:

- View schedules, explore sessions and find networking events
- Curate your personal schedule for easy Conference attendance
- Access location and speaker information at your fingertips
- Post updates to sessions, keynotes, and exhibitor booths
- Interact with a real-time feed of all event activity, that showcases which sessions are trending, most popular photos and popular discussion topics
- Expand your professional network and have fun!

Features of the App:

- Update - a quick way to share photos, comments, and which session you're attending
- Activity Feed - the real-time pulse of the event. See what people are saying, view photos from the event, and find trending sessions and topics
- Agenda - view the full agenda and related information (session time, room number, speaker info, etc)
- Users - see who's at the event, and connect with them on the App
- Exhibitors - find exhibitors and sponsors

Enjoy the App and have a great Conference!

title: Comment Eviter le Cancer de la Prostate - Cancer
description:
La prostate est l’appareil qui produit le liquide séminal qui nourrit et transporte le sperme chez l’homme.

Le cancer de la prostate est un cancer qui est fréquent et qui touche la prostate, une glande du sexe de l'homme. Ce cancer se développe à partir des tissus de la prostate quand des cellules y mutent et se multiplient de manière incontrôlée. Les symptômes de cette maladie sont des difficultés pour uriner, même si parfois il n'y en a pas ; c’est une maladie qui ronge et détruit l’appareil génital de l’homme. 
Dans cette application nous vous proposons des méthodes, des informations et des conseils qui permettent de l’éviter.
Téléchargez et profitez !!

title: 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터
description:
나를 위한 또 한 명의 세컨드 닥터

전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터는 암 수술 후 빠른 회복과 삶의 질 향상을 필요로 하는 분들을 위해 만들어진 개인 맞춤형 전문 건강관리 솔루션입니다.

세컨드 닥터 시리즈는 총 개발기간 5년, 56명의 의사, 간호사, 임상영양전문가, 임상운동전문가들이 함께 기획 개발한 솔루션입니다.
또한 서비스의 효과성을 평가하기 위해 삼성서울병원, 세브란스 본원, 서울성모병원, 국립암센터가 공동으로 임상연구를 진행하였으며, 이에 대한 연구결과를 발표하였습니다. 
본 서비스는 한국정보화진흥원과 중소기업청의 지원을 받아 서비스의 완성도를 높였으며, 한국 식약처과 미국 FDA의 승인을 완료한 인증받은 서비스입니다. 

실천하세요!
여러분의 건강정보를 바탕으로 1:1 맞춤형 가이드를 제시합니다.

이제부터 전립선암을 하나의 앱으로 관리하실 수 있습니다.

■ 왜 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터 일까요?
• 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터는 단일 정보로만 가이드를 제공하지 않습니다. 질환력, 회복경과, 성별, 연령, 신체정보 등 다방향으로 사용자의 상태를 분석하여 중증질환에 적합한 맞춤형 서비스를 제공합니다.

■ 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터는 어떤 기능이 있을까요?
• 전문가상담: 운동, 영양 전문가와 1:1상담을 통해 궁금증을 해결하세요.
• 운동관리: 맞춤형 운동 가이드를 따라 동영상 또는 자유 운동을 할 수 있습니다.
• 식사관리: 쉽고 빠르게 식사일기를 작성하세요! 식사패턴과 영양소 분석을 통해 평가해드립니다.
• 맞춤건강정보: 나에게 필요한 질환과 건강관리에 대한 유익한 정보와 가이드를 모두 담았습니다. 
• 혈당관리: 직접 또는 블루투스 혈당계를 통해 혈당일기를 작성하고 관리할 수 있습니다.
• 혈압관리: 직접 또는 블루투스 혈압계를 통해 혈압일기를 작성하고 관리할 수 있습니다.
• 체중관리: 집접 또는 블루투스 체중계를 통해 체중을 기록할 수 있습니다.
• 복약/금연관리: 약 시간을 잊지 않도록 복용약을 등록하고 섭취 기록을 남겨보세요. 금연 기록도 함께 작성할 수 있습니다.
• 활동량 관리(+Dofit밴드): 걸음수, 소모 칼로리, 심박수를 확인하고 목표를 달성하세요.
• 수면관리(+Dofit밴드): 수면을 측정해보세요. 얕은수면, 깊은수면, 수면효율을 분석해드립니다.
• 스트레스관리(+Dofit밴드): 스트레스를 측정해보세요. 하루동안의 스트레스를 분석하여 평가해드립니다.

■ Dofit 밴드 안내
• Dofit 밴드 및 서비스에 대한 자세한 내용은 http://www.dofitband.com/ 에서 확인하세요.


■ 고객센터 안내
• 앱 문의: appinfo@medisolution.co.kr


메디플러스솔루션은 앞으로도 삶의 질 향상을 위해 최선을 다하는 헬스케어 전문기업이 되겠습니다.

또한 서비스의 효과성을 평가하기 위해 삼성서울병원, 세브란스 본원, 서울성모병원, 국립암센터가 공동으로 임상연구를 진행하였으며, 이에 대한 연구결과를 발표하였습니다. 
본 서비스는 한국정보화진흥원과 중소기업청의 지원을 받아 서비스의 완성도를 높였으며, 한국 식약처과 미국 FDA의 승인을 완료한 인증받은 서비스입니다. 

실천하세요!
여러분의 건강정보를 바탕으로 1:1 맞춤형 가이드를 제시합니다.

이제부터 전립선암을 하나의 앱으로 관리하실 수 있습니다.

■ 왜 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터 일까요?
• 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터는 단일 정보로만 가이드를 제공하지 않습니다. 질환력, 회복경과, 성별, 연령, 신체정보 등 다방향으로 사용자의 상태를 분석하여 중증질환에 적합한 맞춤형 서비스를 제공합니다.

■ 전립선암 by 세컨드 닥터는 어떤 기능이 있을까요?
• 전문가상담: 운동, 영양 전문가와 1:1상담을 통해 궁금증을 해결하세요.
• 운동관리: 맞춤형 운동 가이드를 따라 동영상 또는 자유 운동을 할 수 있습니다.
• 식사관리: 쉽고 빠르게 식사일기를 작성하세요! 식사패턴과 영양소 분석을 통해 평가해드립니다.
• 맞춤건강정보: 나에게 필요한 질환과 건강관리에 대한 유익한 정보와 가이드를 모두 담았습니다.
• 혈당관리: 직접 또는 블루투스 혈당계를 통해 혈당일기를 작성하고 관리할 수 있습니다.
• 혈압관리: 직접 또는 블루투스 혈압계를 통해 혈압일기를 작성하고 관리할 수 있습니다.
• 체중관리: 집접 또는 블루투스 체중계를 통해 체중을 기록할 수 있습니다.
• 복약/금연관리: 약 시간을 잊지 않도록 복용약을 등록하고 섭취 기록을 남겨보세요. 금연 기록도 함께 작성할 수 있습니다.
• 활동량 관리(+Dofit밴드): 걸음수, 소모 칼로리, 심박수를 확인하고 목표를 달성하세요.
• 수면관리(+Dofit밴드): 수면을 측정해보세요. 얕은수면, 깊은수면, 수면효율을 분석해드립니다.
• 스트레스관리(+Dofit밴드): 스트레스를 측정해보세요. 하루동안의 스트레스를 분석하여 평가해드립니다.

■ Dofit 밴드 안내
• Dofit 밴드 및 서비스에 대한 자세한 내용은 http://www.dofitband.com/ 에서 확인하세요.

title: Cancer Risk Calculator
description:
This application estimates your risk of cancer, subdivided into 26 types and based on 350 different risk factors described in the scientific literature. Results are displayed for 10-, 20- and 30-year timeframes, with a subdivision in anatomical or pathological subtypes if possible.

This application has the CE conformity mark as a medical device with a low risk. As such, we have followed the Class I conformity assessment procedures as described in Annex VII Module A, EC Declaration of Conformity. As it it is considered a medical device that poses minimal risk to patients and consumers, it falls under the FDA exercise enforcement discretions. For more information, please visit the relevant section the official FDA website: https://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/mobile-medical-applications/examples-mobile-apps-which-fda-will-exercise-enforcement-discretion

To use this application, create an account and enter the requested information in the different tabs as accurately and completely as you can. All information that is requested will influence your risk for at least one type of cancer, so the more complete and accurate the information you enter, the more dependable the results. Age, gender and racial background are critical, all other information is optional. The results will appear after you have completed the last tab and can always be revisited by tapping your name. You can also edit the information you submitted to see how this influences your results.

The lifetime probabilities of developing cancers were based on USA data from the National Cancer Institute's (NCI's) Surveillance, Epidemiology, and End Results (SEER) Program, collected since 1973 and by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC's) National Program of Cancer Registries (NPCR), collected since 1995. These figures were adapted by the hazard ratios available in the published peer-reviewed literature. Only risk factors with a quantifiable risk were included. Risk factors requiring complex tests not available to the average clinician were excluded. Meta-analyses were given preference when available.

DISCLAIMER: This application is strictly educational and all information contained herein cannot and should not replace assessment by a physician. The evaluations presented represent our best efforts to conveniently assess cancer risk. However, as significant controversy and widely different study results can persist around the impact of even a single variable in a strictly selected population, this is based on a large number of assumptions, extrapolations and estimates. As not every study includes a multivariate analysis and the effect of some risk factors on certain cancers is so large their effect cannot be eliminated from basic probability, a bias toward overestimation of risk is possible. Furthermore, there is continuous progress in the scientific literature. Any figures should therefore be regarded as indicative, but not precise.
Any information you enter into this application will only be stored on your device and will never be sent to us or to any other party, for any reason.

All research and medical support for this application was done by Dr. Philippe Westerlinck, radiation oncologist and clinical chair at the University Hospital of Liège, superspecialising in gastro-intestinal, lung and breast cancers.

recentChanges: Added new risk calculations.
comments: Fast, workable in office setting.

Pretty neat! I wish it would include more lifestyle and environmental factors like occupation and proximity to freeways, airports etc. but I think for a free app it is quite thorough. Well researched, cited sources, and gives recommendations on how to reduce risk. This app came recommended to me by a healthcare provider at one if the world's foremost cancer research and treatment hospitals.

-> Well designed interface -> Accurate info -> Runs quickly -> Does not take a lot of battery -> Customer service could have been better they refused to explain the link between cancer and allergies directly to me even though I indicated specifically that they could use big words.
Interesting app. The only issue I had was that I have no idea how to answer a lot of the questions - is my diet rich in selenium? No idea.
This is great! love the citations to research to explain the reasoning. And the suggestions of actions to take to lower your risk.

title: Information about prostatite 2020
description:
Prostatic hypertrophy Is the enlargement of the Prostate Gland due to the Increase in the Size of the Cells in the Prostate Gland .
Symptoms Of Prostatic Hypertrophy :
Weak Urine Flow
Frequent Urination
Frequent Urination During Nights
Pain During Urination
Pain During Ejaculation
Blood in the Urine
Blood in the Semen
Lower Back Pain
Above Mentioned are Some of the Symptoms of Prostatic Hypertrophy.
Please contact your Local Hospital or Doctor If you have any of the Above Symptoms to check for the Prostatic Hypertrophy .
Causes Of Prostatic Hypertrophy :
The Main cause of the Prostatic Hypertrophy is The Increase in the Size of the Cells in the Prostate Gland , But the Cause for this Abnormal Growth In Unknown .
Who are At Risk of Prostatic Hypertrophy :
Prostatic Hypertrophy can Cause to Any men at any age , But the Men Between Age groups from 45 – 65 Are More Likely to Suffer from Prostatic Hypertrophy , this is Because the Prostate Gland has 2 Phases of Growth While the First phase start from age 1 to 25 while the second phase starts from age 25-50+ , During the First phase the Prostate gland never shown abnormal growth so mostly the Prostatic Hypertrophy is not easy to be seen in younger men , But the Second Phase Starts from 25 yrs of Age we have seen the Abnormal Cell Growth in the Prostate Gland either Increase in the Number of Cells in the Prostate Gland or the Increase in the Size of the Cells In the Prostate Gland .This is why Prostatic Hypertrophy is Mostly seen in the Older men age groups between 45-65 yrs .
Treatment For Prostatic Hypertrophy :
Antibiotics are usually used as the Primary Treatment option for the Prostatic Hypertrophy which sometimes can give Patients Relief from the Painful Symptoms as long as they Take the Pills .
Once the Body Develop Resistance towards Antibiotics the Patients have no More Relief from Antibiotics , and Antibiotics should be Strictly Avoided in this Case , Long term Usage of Antibiotics can cause Severe Damage to the kidney & Liver .
Patients with Enlarged Prostate are sometimes Prescribed with the Alpha-Blocker Treatment that is to use alpha-Blockers to Relax the Tissue or Muscle in the Prostate Area . Which Could Provide the Patients a Relief from the Symptoms , Due to the Complications From the Muscle Relaxers or the Tissue Softeners patients are Not allowed for a Long term usage of the Medication , which is also prescribed for the Patients suffering from Heart Problems . With out Usage of the Medication the Patients will soon notice their Symptoms Recurrence . Even Pain Killers which are called As NSAID’s  Are also Prescribed to the Patients which also a Temporary Symptom Management Treatment Option where patients will find the Recurrence of the Symptoms .
Surgery can be an Other Option for the Prostatic Hypertrophy , which can be done minimally invasive Surgery with the help of robot , to remove the partial Tissue from the Prostate Gland Thus Giving Patient A Relief From the Prostatic Hypertrophy , Due its High Cost and Dreadful Side effects such as Stroke , Severe Pain , Erectile Dysfunction , Sudden Death . Patients are not showing Much Interest Towards the Surgical Treatment .
Best Treatment for the Prostatic Hypertrophy :
Dr.Ming Traditional Chinese Medicine Called Nanke Pills Are considered as the Best Treatment for Prostatic Hypertrophy , The Treatment Consists of the Oral Herbal Medication which should be taken as prescribed by the Doctor ,The Medication is the Formula that Derived from Traditional Chinese Medicine which is Practicing Since 3500 Years .
According to the Traditional Chinese Medicine The Cause for this Condition is the Abnormal Cell Growth due to the Body Providing the environment for the Abnormal Growth Of the Cells in the Prostate gland . The Reason for the Abnormal Cell growth , the Environment is the Increased heat in the Body which is the Reason why the Causing the Abnormal Cell Growth.

title: PROSTATE INTERNATIONAL
description:
Prostate International, the official English-language journal of Asia Pacific Prostate Society (APPS), is an international peer-reviewed academic journal dedicated to basic and clinical studies on prostate cancer, benign prostatic hyperplasia, prostatitis, and other prostatic diseases. Original articles and topical reviews along with case reports on various prostate-related conditions and problems are published in Prostate International, covering the state-of-the-art contents. Prostate International represents the only academic journal devoted to various prostatic diseases in Asian Pacific region. The incidence, characteristics, and management of various diseases may vary according to region and race. Prostate International brings solid coverage of prostatic diseases in Asian Pacific men. Prostate International also serves as a medium for cooperation amongst urologists and specialists from around the world focusing on various aforementioned prostatic conditions. 

four times a year, all members of the APPS receive every issue of Prostate International as a benefit of their APPS membership.

title: How to Get Rid of Prostatitis - Prostate Treatment
description:
A prostate infection (prostatitis) occurs when your prostate and the surrounding area become inflamed. The prostate is about the size of a walnut. It’s located between the bladder and the base of the penis. The tube that moves urine from the bladder to the penis (urethra) runs through the center of your prostate. The urethra also moves semen from the sex glands to the penis.

Several types of infections can affect the prostate. Some men with prostatitis experience no symptoms at all, while others report many, including intense pain.

Types of prostatitis

Acute bacterial: This type is the least common and lasts a short time. It can also be life-threatening if left untreated. This is the easiest type of prostatitis to diagnose.

Chronic bacterial: Symptoms are less intense and develop over several years. It’s more likely to affect young and middle-aged men and cause recurring urinary tract infections (UTIs).

Chronic prostatitis, or chronic pelvic pain syndrome: This condition causes pain and discomfort around the groin and pelvic area. It can affect men of all ages.

Asymptomatic inflammatory : The prostate is inflamed but there are no symptoms. It’s usually discovered when a doctor is diagnosing another problem.


Disclaimer : How to Get Rid of Prostatitis - Prostate Treatment App is for informational and education purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical or health advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.

title: Disease Prevention
description:
The application provides disease prevention and gives detailed analysis for diseases - diabetes type 2, prostate cancer, heart attack, stroke and colon cancer. The mobile application is designed to determine the risk of the diseases based on the user's personal data entered.

The application supports four languages in which a user can conduct a prediction of diabetes, prostate cancer, heart attack, stroke and colon cancer. 

An application based on a conducted risk assessment, gives users the ability insight into a detailed analysis of the risk assessment results. On the base of assessed result, the app presents the proposal of preventive nutrition weekly menu for the selected disease.
For each specific disease - type 2 diabetes, prostate cancer, heart attack, stroke and colon cancer, a special nutrition menu is created based on the proposals of nutrition experts. The user is provided with an overview of the weekly detail menu especially adapted for a particular disease. For every day of the week, a complete nutrition menu was presented.

Application features:
- Selection one of the four languages (English, German, Spanish and Croatian) that are supported in the mobile app,
- A risk assessment for the selected disease - Type 2 diabetes, Prostate cancer, Heart attack, Stroke and Colon cancer,
- Overview of detailed diagnosis and analysis of the performed risk assessment,
- A review of the weekly PREVENTIVE nutrition complete menu for each disease (Type 2 diabetes, Prostate cancer, Heart attack, Stroke and Colon cancer) that is supported in the app,
- PREDICTION DIARY, a diary of monitoring personal information and prediction results for each performed prediction.


DISCLAIMER:
This mobile application and decision support system is only used for research purposes with the aim of early disease prevention. The application is not intended for resolving life-threatening diseases. This prediction is not a clinical test and the results are only indicative.

This mobile application and decision support system is only used for research purposes with the aim of early disease prevention. The application is not intended for resolving life-threatening diseases. This prediction is not a clinical test and the results are only indicative.

title: How to get rid of prostatitis?
description:
Prostatitis is an inflammatory process of prostate tissue.

The prostate gland belongs to the male reproductive system. This is the structure that is in front of the rectum and under the bladder, surrounding the urethra. That is why, when the prostate gland becomes inflamed, it compresses the urethra, which subsequently leads to various problems with urination. The main function of the prostate is the secretion (fluid) production, which is part of the sperm and dilutes it to ensure normal sperm motility.

Prostatitis as a disease is most often encountered in the practice of a urologist. It can occur suddenly (acutely) or gradually, and its manifestations are constant and prolonged (chronic). The chronic form is much more common than acute.

Very often, pathological conditions of the prostate gland, such as cancer or benign hyperplasia, are detected in elderly patients. The insidious difference between prostatitis is that it affects men of any age (usually from 30 to 50 years old).

title: PP - Prostate Prognostic
description:
O objetivo do PP - Prostate Prognostic é avaliar o prognóstico de câncer de próstata, calculando o risco de um tumor se disseminar para outros órgãos à distância, através de metástases.

O Prostate Prognostic usa um modelo de regressão logística múltipla para calcular o risco de um tumor se disseminar para outros órgãos à distância, através de metástases. O modelo é baseado em informações de idade do paciente (anos), da dosagem do PSA - antígeno prostático específico (ng/ml), do padrão de Gleason principal e do padrão de Gleason secundário.

title: Types of Cancer Treatment
description:
There are many types of cancer treatment. The types of treatment that you receive will depend on the type of cancer you have and how advanced it is.

Some people with cancer will have only one treatment. But most people have a combination of treatments, such as surgery with chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy. When you need treatment for cancer, you have a lot to learn and think about. It is normal to feel overwhelmed and confused. But, talking with your doctor and learning about the types of treatment you may have can help you feel more in control.

description: Cancer, also called malignancy, is an abnormal growth of cells. There are more than 100 types of cancer, including breast cancer, skin cancer, lung cancer, colon cancer, prostate cancer, and lymphoma. Symptoms vary depending on the type. Cancer treatment may include chemotherapy, radiation, and/or surgery. This app contained information about cancer disease and its treatment.

title: PROCURE Ride App
description:
The current crisis has had a deep impact on our fundraising activities, hindering our support to the thousands of men living with prostate cancer and their families. Even if Quebec is on pause, our fight continues.

Therefore, this year, the Tour du Courage PROCURE wishes to highlight the prostate cancer awareness month, September. Every day in Quebec, 12 men are diagnosed with prostate cancer. In September, this number represents 360 men learning the news.

In recognition of these men, we are challenging all cyclists in Quebec to travel up to 360 km in a day, a week, or even a month. Each kilometer traveled pays tribute to a man diagnosed, each dollar raised contributes to support and research.

Beginner or advanced cyclists, join the movement and choose your challenge against prostate cancer.

title: Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score
description:
"Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score" is an application designed for calculating International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) in patients with prostate enlargement, especially benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). "Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score" should be filled by the patient himself. "Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score" is based on the answers to seven questions concerning urinary symptoms and one question concerning quality of life. The answers are assigned points from 0 to 5. The total score can therefore range from 0 to 35 (asymptomatic to very symptomatic).

Why should you choose "Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score"?
🔸 Simple and very easy to use.
🔸 Accurate and precise calculation of IPSS score.
🔸 Interpretation is given based on IPSS score.
🔸 Classification of severity of lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS).
🔸 It is totally free. Download now!

In "Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score", the IPSS score will be classified into three categories, mild LUTS, moderate LUTS, and severe LUTS. Mild LUTS if IPSS score <= 7, moderate LUTS 8-19, and severe LUTS >=20. In the result page of "Urology IPSS Prostate Score: BPH Symptoms Score" are given forms to write patient's name, age, and today's date. The result page can be screenshotted for doctor's archives. This could be used to monitor patient's symptoms improvement after treatment. 

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com

title: Fight Cancer Naturally
description:
Fight Cancer Naturally(FCN) : Holistic Perspective  with a Natural food , herbs, Keto diet and Natural supplements. 

FCN provides cancer detection tools information and treatment approach in practices  
- About Cancer & its Types
- Diagnosis / Conventional toolsof Cancer
- Standard Therapies for cancer treatment and its usages
- Approach towardsCancer  : Conventional , natural and integrative Approach
Natural food, raw organic fresh pressed juice, supplements and herbs

*Success stories:  Practical appliance and knowledge sharing on cancer.
*Cancer Fighting Raw diet Videos: Few video tutorials for guidance on how to prepare you diet.
*Ketogenic Therapy for Cancer:

Cancer Glucose Index: Here you can enter values of glucose and ketone to monitor Cancer therapy.
Cancer GKI Analysis: Check and analyze your GKI, which should be under therapeutic treatment, which is less than 1(<1).

*Tumor Gene with Natural Substances:
In addition to the use of food, herbs and species, plants also been utilized as medicine. Major anti-cancer products and their principal target tumor genes

*Standard Diet Plan: Helps you to build your diet plan.

Ketogenic Feature : It is not a general nutrition app, but it gives you the information whether you are in therapeutic range for treating cancer. This app can be used for weight loss.

Urine ketosticks are known to yield inaccurate results, while blood keto and sugar levels give accurate results, based on the test result. FCN app shows you whether you are in ketosis or not and also lets you know that you are in therapeutic range to fight cancer.
Quick & simple way to monitor and track your personal nutrition on

 •Fats
 •Carbs
 •Proteins
 •GKI Index
• Cancer therapeutic Range
• Tracking the Glucose ketone index
• Re-plan diet
• Progress towards therapeutic management with graphs.

If you stick to a ketogenic diet plan and monitor your sugar and ketones with GKI index, we believe that you can achieve weight loss, improve your blood pressure, improve your sugar levels and enhance chances to control and treat cancer. 
It has been designed to track the Zone of metabolic management for ‘Glucose Ketone Index’ (GKI) based upon the concept of Sugar feed Cancer by the noble prize of Mr. Otto Heinrich Warburg.
Goals include weight loss and therapeutic range for cancer treatment.

•Very important tool for Doctors & Cancer Patients who are trying to follow Keto Diet and Natural substances 

FCN feature : Progress towards Therapeutic management:
1) On right track 
2) Increase ketone
•Increase fat (Coconut oil, MCT oil etc.,) 
3) Decrease carbs
•Low glycemic index foods 
4) Either increase ketones or Decrease carbs

How it works:
•Define your net requirement (Ketogenic diet plan) per day for calories in terms of fats, proteins, and carbs based up on your personal data and BMI.
•Enter the Glucose levels in mg/dl and enter the ketone level using glucose keto meter with drop of blood 
•View and add values per samples.
•Analyze your cancer therapeutic ketosis GKI values.
•Shows you the info whether you are in % of time in metabolic Zone.
•Re-plan you diet based on the analysis. Get new diet plan after 2 weeks of implementation.

Three pitfalls to avoid – Many people who use low carb diets that after some time, their weight loss stalls or they may even regain weight eating too much of protein even from low carb sources.

 •Eating too many calories even from low carb sources
•Eating too little fat which can prevent ketosis.
•Remain in ketosis even if you slip and get back on track again faster.

Email @ support@seawellsoft.com for prompt replies/ Visit our web site http://cancerdiet.club/

title: Blood cancer
description:
If you want to know everything about blood cancer,this application will help you.
There are many types of blood cancer:melanoma,leukemia,lymphoma,..
Just like breast cancer,prostate cancer,pancreatic cancer,skin cancer,ovarian cancer,colorectal cancer,...blood cancer is a pathology that humanity find it difficult to solve it. 
In this application,you will find allthing about blood cancer:blood cancer symptoms and causes and blood cancer treatments. 
Make sure you will learn many things from this application. Please share this application with your friends if you care about their healths.

title: Movember
description:
Movember is the leading charity tackling men’s health on a global scale, year round. We’re tackling some of the biggest health issues faced by men: prostate cancer, testicular cancer, and mental health and suicide prevention. We have one goal: to stop men dying too young.

In the month formerly known as November, Mo Bros and Mo Sistas across the world Grow a Moustache (or 'Mo'), Move for Movember or Host a Mo-ment to raise much-needed funds for men’s health.

Grow a moustache
Whatever you grow will save a bro. Trucker, regent, connoisseur or wisp - no matter the style of Mo you rock this Movember, your face will raise funds and awareness for men's health.

Move for Movember
Commit to running or walking 60km over the month, at your own pace. That's 60km for the 60 men we lose to suicide each hour, every hour across the world.

Host a Mo-ment
Rally a crew and do something fun and easy. Hosting is all about having a good time for a good cause.

summary: For an Android Mo on the go, this app has all the tools you need this Movember.
developerAddress: 1518 Abbot Kinney Blvd, LOS ANGELES, VENICE, California, United States 90291-3743
recentChanges:
- Take selfies of your moustache with the Camera and add Movember filters and stickers to share with friends (signup not required)
- Use Mo Tracker to track your moustache as it grows, and create a movie at the end of the month
- Easily share the link to your Mo Space fundraising page via your social media and messaging apps, and now via your unique QR code
- Set a fundraising target, track your donations and thank your supporters
comments: There does not appear to be any way that folks with learning disabilities can get involved with movember,or am I missing something

Honestly, this app is more of a discouragement to keep going than anything else. There multiple key features missing that are available on the site and not on the app. you cannot post your moves to facebook when you make them (thus you're just posting to no one/your mospace when you do your move). You can take a picture, but you cannot save it, or post it, or do anything with it. If you tap randomly on your screen though, you might be able to get the app to save the picture to your camera roll. The time to post moves is in 24-hr format for no apparent reason, it defaults to KM and does not save your choice in the future. There are a slew of other issues too. Most of all, it really sucks that you cannot post your moves to FB as that, personally, would be my main way of spreading the word about the cause.

I only use this app for a month each year. However, since applying the latest upgrade, it crashes on startup. I can do everything I need to on the website except update my mo-gress. Samsung K-zoom Android  Thank you (Randy?) for responding to my review. I too am a very old version (1951) but at least manage to start up every morning. While upgrading my operating system may not be an option, hopefully by MOvember 2019 I will have upgraded to a new phone altogether :-{

This app is rubbish, it is hard to use, no clear way to save photos (for some reason I can't save photos I have posted to my page...) I can't get a link to my page anywhere on the app. This really needs some serious work! Here is hoping people don't use it as an excuse not to raise funds for this awesome cause. Luckily I am just going to the web page on my phone.

Literally cannot get the app to let me log in. It recognizes me via FB log in as well as welcoming me back using email instead but either way, it absolutely will Not let me log in (Android) so it's pointless either way I try. :( I've used this app every year for years but remove it between uses and have never encountered this serious of a problem with it before now.

title: ProsCApp
description:
Welcome to the ProsCApp (Prostate Cancer App) and congratulations for choosing to utilize this App in your daily clinical practice. This App was designed primarily as a virtual coach for those involved in the delivery of care of patients diagnosed with prostate cancer.

 -- The ProsCApp has been endorsed by the European Association of Urology Nurses (EAUN) -- 

The App has been designed by a group of experts in prostate cancer care with the aim to assist healthcare professionals (primarily cancer nurses) to provide optimal care to their patients with an emphasis on the patients’ (and family’s) needs. Providing care to patients diagnosed with, living with and beyond prostate cancer and their families is a complex process that requires extensive knowledge on the physical (i.e. biological) aspects of the disease as well as its emotional, social and spiritual dimensions.

The ProsCApp provides only a virtual coach approach to identifying and addressing needs in this patient group and it is not meant to replace expert clinical critical thinking.

A number of interventions requires specialist training by the nurses and therefore the recommendations made by the App are not applicable to specific contexts. The level of nursing training is highly variant across Europe, so is the rest of the work. Therefore, the implementation of certain interventions might not be possible in some countries.

title: Enlarged Prostate Help
description:
Would you like to have control of your body again, relax, regain confidence, and achieve your work duties and social goals!

With this app, we have compiled ancient remedies for enlarged prostate. We give you only the successful ones. Here is the table of contents:

--What is enlarged prostate?
--Symptoms of enlarged prostate 
--Herbal cures
--Chinese herbal cures
--Ayurveda
--Homeopathic remedies
--Bach Flower remedies
--Aromatherapy
--Vitamins and minerals as support

How to use this app?

There are three important buttons:

-- Your Therapy

-- Symptoms

-- Description of remedies 

First tap on Symptoms and then tap on one or more icons that say Add to Your Therapy You will see a short message ("toast") that the symptom is entered into the therapy.

You can select all symptoms that you want now or later, it does not matter. Once entered, you will be able to delete the chosen symptom with a click of a button.

Then tap on various groups of remedies. Typically, these will be Homeopathy, Bach Flower Remedies, Ayurveda and others. Visit these therapies and tap on icon to select the remedy and enter it into the chosen therapy. 

Finally, tap on Your Therapy. You will see a list of symptoms (in orange) mixed with a list of remedies (green) that you have selected. Taken together, the symptoms and the remedies form your therapy. Now all you have to do is obtain the remedies and start the process of eventual improvement of your health. 

The whole process takes less than five minutes but will cut down the time to search for remedies. We have chosen only the proven remedies from various types of healing so let this be a firm base for further research of yours. In the meantime, you undertook the first step towards the change of your life. 

If the symptoms change, you may repeat the entire process. 

The app is free and is supported by (hopefully non intrusive) ads. This app belongs to a wider group of apps that may be able to help you improve your health. Please visit the option Other apps to see what else do we have.

title: Check Tings Out
description:
Application for Prostate Cancer Evaluation & Education.

Black African Caribbean and African men (with West African heritage) are at increased risk of developing prostate cancer at an earlier age.

We are in a barber's shop, where Vincent, Enus, Patty Dumplin and Carl discuss Prostate cancer. Symptoms and history are collected to provide an estimation of risk, and the procedures at the doctor's and hospital are described.

This app is a collaborative effort between Nottingham Trent University, Mon0Lisa Productions, BME Cancer Communities and Friends and Bredrins prostate cancer support group.

Mon0Lisa voices Enus, Vincent, Carl and Patty Dumplin. The music "Tree Cups of Crystal Clear Water" was provided with kind permission of Elijah Israel. With thanks to Mr Masood Khan, Consultant Urological Surgeon within University Hospitals of Leicester NHS Trust.

title: Comment prévenir le cancer de la prostate
description:
La prostate est située entre la vessie et le rectum et est responsable de la production de liquide séminal. Les options de traitement du cancer de la prostate dépendent de l'état d'avancement du cancer. Mais vous pouvez éviter le pire en adoptant des techniques simples pour éviter cette maladie qui touche un grand nombre d’homme.
Télécharger cette application qui vous offre des conseils pratiques et efficaces pour lutter contre le cancer de la prostate.

Prostatite

description:
بسم الله الرحمان الرحيم 
السلام عليكم و رحمة الله تعالى و بركاته
مرحبا بكم في تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت

 سيدي سيدتي : 

مرحبا بكم في هذا التطبيق الجديد و الرائع الذي سيبهركم بالمحتوى الذي وضعنا فيه و الفريد من نوعه من اجلكم و من اجل صحتكم و صحة عائلتكم و ابنائكم.

 سيدي سيدتي : 

انه تطبيق الطب و الصحة طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت.
تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت يحتوي على وصفات و نصائح جد جد فعالة لامراض السرطان المعدية و الخطيرة التي من الممكن ان تؤذيك او تؤذي فردا من عائلتك او ابنائك الصغار، و كذا أعراضها و طرق الوقاية منها.
تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت سيساعدك كثيرا في تحسين وضعك الصحي و وضع عائلتك و ابنائك، كما الوقاية من أمراض السرطان المعدية و الخطيرة.

 سيدي سيدتي : 

التطبيق جديد و حصري، جميل جدا، و سهل الاستعمال.
يمكنكم استعماله حتى في حالة عدم وجود انترنت.

لا تنسوا الظغط على 5 نجوم ان اعجبك التطبيق، و اطلاعنا على رايك حول التطبيق، هذا مهم جدا لنا لكي نعطي اكثر و اكثر من طاقتنا لابهاركم.

لا تنسى تقييم التطبيق فرأيك مهم جدا لنا و شكرا جزيلا !
حملوا التطبيق الآن و استمتعوا.

title: ProsCApp
description:
Welcome to the ProsCApp (Prostate Cancer App) and congratulations for choosing to utilize this App in your daily clinical practice. This App was designed primarily as a virtual coach for those involved in the delivery of care of patients diagnosed with prostate cancer.

 -- The ProsCApp has been endorsed by the European Association of Urology Nurses (EAUN) -- 

The App has been designed by a group of experts in prostate cancer care with the aim to assist healthcare professionals (primarily cancer nurses) to provide optimal care to their patients with an emphasis on the patients’ (and family’s) needs. Providing care to patients diagnosed with, living with and beyond prostate cancer and their families is a complex process that requires extensive knowledge on the physical (i.e. biological) aspects of the disease as well as its emotional, social and spiritual dimensions.

The ProsCApp provides only a virtual coach approach to identifying and addressing needs in this patient group and it is not meant to replace expert clinical critical thinking.

A number of interventions requires specialist training by the nurses and therefore the recommendations made by the App are not applicable to specific contexts. The level of nursing training is highly variant across Europe, so is the rest of the work. Therefore, the implementation of certain interventions might not be possible in some countries.

title: Enlarged Prostate Help
description:
Would you like to have control of your body again, relax, regain confidence, and achieve your work duties and social goals!

With this app, we have compiled ancient remedies for enlarged prostate. We give you only the successful ones. Here is the table of contents:

--What is enlarged prostate?
--Symptoms of enlarged prostate 
--Herbal cures
--Chinese herbal cures
--Ayurveda
--Homeopathic remedies
--Bach Flower remedies
--Aromatherapy
--Vitamins and minerals as support

How to use this app?

There are three important buttons:

-- Your Therapy

-- Symptoms

-- Description of remedies 

First tap on Symptoms and then tap on one or more icons that say Add to Your Therapy You will see a short message ("toast") that the symptom is entered into the therapy.

You can select all symptoms that you want now or later, it does not matter. Once entered, you will be able to delete the chosen symptom with a click of a button.

Then tap on various groups of remedies. Typically, these will be Homeopathy, Bach Flower Remedies, Ayurveda and others. Visit these therapies and tap on icon to select the remedy and enter it into the chosen therapy. 

Finally, tap on Your Therapy. You will see a list of symptoms (in orange) mixed with a list of remedies (green) that you have selected. Taken together, the symptoms and the remedies form your therapy. Now all you have to do is obtain the remedies and start the process of eventual improvement of your health. 

The whole process takes less than five minutes but will cut down the time to search for remedies. We have chosen only the proven remedies from various types of healing so let this be a firm base for further research of yours. In the meantime, you undertook the first step towards the change of your life. 

If the symptoms change, you may repeat the entire process. 

The app is free and is supported by (hopefully non intrusive) ads. This app belongs to a wider group of apps that may be able to help you improve your health. Please visit the option Other apps to see what else do we have.

title: Check Tings Out
description:
Application for Prostate Cancer Evaluation & Education.

Black African Caribbean and African men (with West African heritage) are at increased risk of developing prostate cancer at an earlier age.

We are in a barber's shop, where Vincent, Enus, Patty Dumplin and Carl discuss Prostate cancer. Symptoms and history are collected to provide an estimation of risk, and the procedures at the doctor's and hospital are described.

This app is a collaborative effort between Nottingham Trent University, Mon0Lisa Productions, BME Cancer Communities and Friends and Bredrins prostate cancer support group.

Mon0Lisa voices Enus, Vincent, Carl and Patty Dumplin. The music "Tree Cups of Crystal Clear Water" was provided with kind permission of Elijah Israel. With thanks to Mr Masood Khan, Consultant Urological Surgeon within University Hospitals of Leicester NHS Trust.

title: Comment prévenir le cancer de la prostate
description:
La prostate est située entre la vessie et le rectum et est responsable de la production de liquide séminal. Les options de traitement du cancer de la prostate dépendent de l'état d'avancement du cancer. Mais vous pouvez éviter le pire en adoptant des techniques simples pour éviter cette maladie qui touche un grand nombre d’homme.
Télécharger cette application qui vous offre des conseils pratiques et efficaces pour lutter contre le cancer de la prostate.

Prostatite

description:
بسم الله الرحمان الرحيم 
السلام عليكم و رحمة الله تعالى و بركاته
مرحبا بكم في تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت

 سيدي سيدتي : 

مرحبا بكم في هذا التطبيق الجديد و الرائع الذي سيبهركم بالمحتوى الذي وضعنا فيه و الفريد من نوعه من اجلكم و من اجل صحتكم و صحة عائلتكم و ابنائكم.

 سيدي سيدتي : 

انه تطبيق الطب و الصحة طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت.
تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت يحتوي على وصفات و نصائح جد جد فعالة لامراض السرطان المعدية و الخطيرة التي من الممكن ان تؤذيك او تؤذي فردا من عائلتك او ابنائك الصغار، و كذا أعراضها و طرق الوقاية منها.
تطبيق طبيب العائلة ـ علاج السرطان بدون أنترنت سيساعدك كثيرا في تحسين وضعك الصحي و وضع عائلتك و ابنائك، كما الوقاية من أمراض السرطان المعدية و الخطيرة.

 سيدي سيدتي : 

التطبيق جديد و حصري، جميل جدا، و سهل الاستعمال.
يمكنكم استعماله حتى في حالة عدم وجود انترنت.

title: Prostate In Focus
description:
Prostate in focus APP is the first apps from Glenmark. This APP is a 24/7 access to information - anytime, anywhere on Prostate cancer. The best and fastest way to quickly get reliable drug, disease, diagnostic information and latest updates on disease ,drug and therapy on prostate cancer.

Prostate in focus as a reference app on curing cancer and treatment procedures. This app is solely for educational & instructive purposes only. The app is ideal for all medical professionals, medical residents and interns, nurses, and medical students.

title: Remedios para Próstata
description:
La próstata es una glándula que forma parte del sistema reproductivo masculino. Esta ayuda con la producción de semen, el fluido que contiene esperma. La próstata rodea el tubo que lleva la orina fuera del cuerpo.

 A medida que los hombres envejecen, la próstata se va agrandando. Pero si se agranda demasiado, puede causar problemas.
 La mayoría de los hombres la padecerán al envejecer. Los síntomas comienzan después de los 50 años.  

Aunque la mejor opción es sin duda visitar al médico, aquí dejo algunos remedios naturales que podrían ayudar a aliviar esta afección:consume verduras como tomate,pimientos,brocoli,col,aguacate,zanahoria,y también frutas tales como pera,piña, melón,sandia.

Todo esto te ayudara a desinflamar y así mismo toma mucha agua y infusiones de cola de caballo,diente de león,ajo,
jengibre,pelos de choclo.
Los remedios naturales son excelentes te los recomiendo..

La próstata es una glándula que forma parte del sistema reproductivo masculino. Esta ayuda con la producción de semen, el fluido que contiene esperma. La próstata rodea el tubo que lleva la orina fuera del cuerpo.

A medida que los hombres envejecen, la próstata se va agrandando. Pero si se agranda demasiado, puede causar problemas.
La mayoría de los hombres la padecerán al envejecer. Los síntomas comienzan después de los 50 años.

Aunque la mejor opción es sin duda visitar al médico, aquí dejo algunos remedios naturales que podrían ayudar a aliviar esta afección:consume verduras como tomate,pimientos,brocoli,col,aguacate,zanahoria,y también frutas tales como pera,piña, melón,sandia.

Todo esto te ayudara a desinflamar y así mismo toma mucha agua y infusiones de cola de caballo,diente de león,ajo,
jengibre,pelos de choclo.
Los remedios naturales son excelentes te los recomiendo..
summary: Natural Remedies for the prostate.
recentChanges: Aquí los mejores remedios para la próstata.
comments: Excellent

title: iURO Oncology
description:
iURO Oncology is the must-have app for all uro-oncology healthcare professionals and students. The narrated simulation videos make it easy to understand and explain the different pathologies and therapies. It can be used by doctors and nurses to enhance communication with their patients. Medical students can use iURO apps to increase their knowledge and understanding of various urological and oncological topics.

iURO Oncology can also be used by patients directly, to familiarize themselves with the different aspects of their oncological condition and the treatment options available.

Features include:
•Narrated simulation videos to explain prostate cancer, kidney cancer, bladder cancer and testicular cancer
•Narrated simulation videos to explain different treatment options
•Draw on picture, offering the opportunity to draw on and make personalized notes on a 3D image 
•Send this customized 3D image directly to patients or colleagues by email 
•360º image of the kidney, offering the opportunity to zoom on the 3D image from every angle 

iURO apps are created in consultation with urologists in order to provide a realistic representation of pathologies and therapies. iURO apps are prepared with the aim of enhancing communication and education options. If you are not a healthcare professional, please note that iURO apps support but never substitute the relation with your healthcare professional.

title: Men's App - Salud del hombre
description:
Men’s App es una aplicación para cuidar de tu salud. Ha sido creada por el Dr. Juan Pablo Burgués, urólogo y andrólogo con amplia experiencia profesional, para informarte sobre los problemas de salud que preocupan a los hombres. En Men’s App el Dr. Burgués te habla de temas tan sensibles como la impotencia, la eyaculación precoz, las enfermedades de transmisión sexual, la infertilidad, el déficit de testosterona, la hiperplasia benigna de próstata, el cáncer de próstata, el cáncer de testículo, etc.

No importa si tienes 18 o 70 años. Men’s App muestra contenidos de interés para todos los grupos de edad. Obviamente, las enfermedades de transmisión sexual preocupan más frecuentemente a varones jóvenes, y el cáncer de próstata a varones más maduros, pero todos los temas son de interés general. ¡Nunca está de más aprender!

Tradicionalmente las mujeres siempre han sido conscientes de la necesidad de revisiones ginecológicas desde una edad temprana ¡pero no los hombres! Es cierto que el riesgo de cáncer de útero para las mujeres comienza antes que el riesgo de cáncer de próstata para los hombres, por eso las revisiones urológicas no se recomiendan hasta la década de los 40. Pero, ¿son los varones conscientes de esto? Definitivamente no, los hombres están muy lejos de las mujeres en esta faceta.

Por eso en Men’s App el objetivo del  Dr. Juan Pablo Burgués es concienciar y divulgar información sobre problemas de salud que afectan a los hombres, con un lenguaje sencillo y entendible por cualquiera. También econtrarás algunas herramientas útiles:

- Tienda de productos para el hombre, con artículos cuidadosamente seleccionados por su calidad y su garantía de compra segura.
- Obtén la opinión de un experto.
- Test de autoevaluación sobre alcoholismo.
- Cuestionario de síntomas prostáticos.
- Haz un seguimiento de tu PSA.
- Calculadora de IMC.
- Deja de fumar.
- Sexo seguro.

Puedes usar Men’s App como una herramienta para entender, aprender, prevenir o seguir recomendaciones, pero si tienes un problema nunca debe sustituir a la consulta con tu médico.

La actividad de Men’s App consiste en tips cortos de salud del hombre en www.mens-app.es, en las redes sociales (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin) y en la app. Además, cada cierto tiempo el Dr. Burgués desarrolla un nuevo tema en profundidad que queda para su lectura off-line en la pestaña "Temas" de la app. Estos son algunos de los problemas de salud del hombre que se tratan en Men’s App:

– Hiperplasia benigna de próstata
– Déficit de testosterona
– Impotencia
– Infertilidad
– Eyaculación precoz
– Cáncer de próstata
– Enfermedades de transmisión sexual
– Cáncer de testículo

¡Únete a Men’s App! Y no olvides clickar en Seguir por email para no perderte nada.

title: KARADAMIRAI
description:
Predict your future health by AI 
 
I don’t know what the health check results really means..
Will I be in good health in the future?
Is my current lifestyle healthy?
The app predicts your future body based on cohort big data of 1.5million people in the last 10 years.
 
-Feature of the app-
By entering health check result such as blood test, and answering questions about lifestyle, prediction of 10 disease occurrence probability within 4years become available.
Disease includes: Colorectal cancer, Liver cancer, Lung cancer, Prostate cancer, Stomach cancer, Heart Disease, Dementia, Stroke, Diabetes, Breast cancer
 
You can also use it as health diary as such daily records of weight, BMI, and blood pressure can be saved.
 
■Main Function
-Based on the health check result, it predicts 10 diseases occurrence probability such as breast cancer or colorectal cancer etc-
Based on blood test result and by answering questions about lifestyle, AI predicts 10 diseases occurrence probability within 4years.
 
Besides 10 diseases prediction, you can also check your biological age, survival rate of next 10 years, advice on health care, suggestion about additional health check, a comparison of your data and others’ data in your group. 
Predictable diseases: Colorectal cancer, Liver cancer, Lung cancer, Prostate cancer, Stomach cancer, Heart Disease, Dementia, Stroke, Diabetes, Breast cancer
 
 
-Records your health data on “Karada journal”-
Weight, BMI, body fat percentage, Blood pressure, Alcohol taking, bowel movement and other memos and photos can be recorded.
The first step for healthcare is to check your daily health data and beware of it.
-Graph display of recorded data-
You can check your recorded data by graphs and it makes easy to be aware of the changes. 
 
■About paid service
-AI disease prediction-
$40.99  per prediction
Based on blood test result and by answering questions about lifestyle, AI predicts 10 diseases occurrence probability within 4years.
Predictable Diseases : Colorectal cancer, Liver cancer, Lung cancer, Prostate cancer, Stomach cancer, Heart Disease, Dementia, Stroke, Diabetes, Breast cancer
*Please note that these are required for prediction:
Height, Weight, BMI, Blood Pressure, abdominal circumference, Fasting blood sugar level, total cholesterol, neutral fat, HDL cholesterol, LDL cholesterol, hemoglobin, serum creatine, γGTP, AST, ALT, urinary protein 
 
* Woman cannot check about prostate cancer. Man cannot check about breast cancer
*You cannot check the disease you have now.
 
-Restore when your phone changed-
When you changed your phone, restoring is available for free.  
Please log in to Google Play with the same Google account when you purchased. 
 
-Important notice-
It will be charged via Google account
 
■Terms of Service
https://mirai.karadakarada.com/about/
 
■Privacy Policy
https://mirai.karadakarada.com/privacypolicy/

title: CPC Risk Calculator
description:
The Copenhagen Prostate Cancer Center (CPC) Risk Calculator can estimate the individual risk of biochemical recurrence (defined as first ≥PSA 0.2 ng/ml) after radical prostatectomy for localised prostate cancer. The calculator predicts the absolute risk of biochemical recurrence for the following one- or five years in one-year intervals after surgery. The CPC Risk Calculator has been validated in two large institutional cohorts from Denmark and USA.

The dataset is based on 3.746 men who were followed for 20 years after surgery for prostate cancer without receiving any adjuvant treatment at Copenhagen Prostate Cancer Center, Denmark and Stanford Urology, CA, USA. No patients were lost to follow-up. Initial analyses were performed using time between date of surgery and whatever came first biochemical recurrence (outcome of interest) or death without biochemical recurrence (competing risk). Patients without biochemical recurrence were right-censored at latest follow-up. Two multiple cause-specific Cox proportional hazard regression models, one for biochemical recurrence and one for death without recurrence were combined into estimates of the absolute risks of biochemical recurrence. The analyses include preoperative PSA, pT-category, surgical margin status, and radical prostatectomy Gleason score. All analyses were repeated in yearly intervals after surgery using data from patients who survived without biochemical recurrence. The data were internally validated according statistical standards. External validation showed c-index >85% and Brier scores < 5%.

The Copenhagen Prostate Cancer Center is an international research unit affiliated with The Department of Urology at Rigshospitalet, Copenhagen University Hospital, Denmark.  Stanford Urology is affiliated with Stanford Medical Center, Stanford, CA, USA. 

The statistical model was developed by Prof. Thomas Gerds at The Department of Biostatistics, Faculty of Health and Medical Sciences, University of Copenhagen. The App was developed in collaboration between Andreas Røder (andreasroder@gmail.com) and Daman.dk.

title: NPAA 4.0
description:
The National Prostate Awareness  Association was established to promote the educational awareness, early detection, screening and servicing of males affected by the degenerative diagnosis of prostate cancer.

The consortium plans, develops, evaluates and analyzes strategies that decrease the effects of prostate cancer.  The consortium convenes a public engagement process that builds the capacity of individuals, groups, and organizations to participate in roundtable discussions, development sessions, symposiums, and conferences. The consortium facilitates an advocacy management process that allows stakeholders to collect information, share data, establish structures and impact stakeholders.

The signature intention of the consortium is to build a prostate cancer Health and Wellness Multipurpose Complex.  It is with in this context that an unprecedented legacy for health and wellness will be established at the dawn of the 21st century.

title: Cancer Fighting Food
description: do you have someone close to you or other people you know who have cancer? need recommendation what food that's better for cancer patiet? some experts point out what foods should cancer patients eat and what they should avoid. Experts advise patients to eat the right foods before, during and after treatment.​​​ Foods to include in your diet as a cancer patient: Vegetables    Tomatoes, carr​ots, peas, pumpkin and turnips for vitamins and fibre    Tomatoes, tomato puree and parsley (especially good for prostate cancer patients)    Cruciferous vegetables like broccoli, cauliflower and cabbage contain plant chemicals that can convert bad oestrogen into good oestrogen, and hence reduce cancer risk as well as the risk of a relapse    Asparagus and Brussel sprouts for their rich antioxidants    Bitter gourd for lowering blood sugar levels    Green leafy vegetables for calcium and iron Fruits    Oranges provide vitamin C    Bananas, kiwi, peaches, mangoes, pears and strawberries for vitamins and fibre    Avocadoes, guava, apricots, figs, prunes and raisins for energy Proteins    Lean meat, fish, poultry, eggs, tauhu and taukwa    Dairy products, nuts, dried beans, dhals and chickpeas    Fish and soy foods consumed in moderation for its anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties which may help in preventing infections Foods to avoid as a cancer patient    Deep fried, grilled, barbequed, baked meats since subjecting animal protein to high heat creates carcinogenic byproducts called heterocyclic amines    Excessive intake of salt, sug​ar, and oily foods    Red meat and processed meats such as bacon, ham, sausages    Preserved foods like pickles, jams, kiam chye (salted mustard green), and century eggs as they contain nitrites which are carcinogeni    Minimise alcohol Additionally, cancer patients should avoid excessive intake of vitamin supplements, as they act as antioxidants and can interfere with chemotherapy when taken in large doses. for further information and details, download this now title: My Cancer Coach
description:
My Cancer Coach is a free mobile app developed in partnership with Breastcancer.org, Men’s Health Network, and Fight Colorectal Cancer. The app provides information about personalized cancer treatments to help manage your cancer’s progression. Questions about your stage of cancer? Should you get surgery? Is radiation necessary? Do you need chemotherapy? Is your cancer metastatic? My Cancer Coach provides easy-to-understand treatment information for breast, prostate, and colon cancer patients and their caregivers. 
 
Features:
- Questionnaire and personalized treatment report
- Questions to ask your doctor 
- Videos and other helpful resources such as links to patient advocacy websites
- Easy-to-update journal with photo and audio-recording entry options
- Calendar to help keep track of doctor appointments, support group meetings, and other important dates
- Glossary of common terms
 
My Cancer Coach was named one of the Best Breast Cancer Apps by Healthline.com for two consecutive years - 2016 & 2017.
 
For more information online, visit www.MyCancerCoachApp.org

recentChanges:
YOUR RESOURCES
There are many videos and websites that may help you throughout your cancer journey. Now you can save them to the new My Resources so that you can access them anytime.

VOICE MEMOS
Voice memos have been completely redesigned to improve your experience while recording your journal entries or answers to your questions. You can now see how long the memo has been recording, skip to a specific time during playback, and pause the memo during playback.

A great app and VERY USEFUL

title: Alimentation Anti Cancer
description:
On estime qu’un homme sur deux et une femme sur trois seront touchés par un cancer au cours de leur vie. Chez l’homme, les cancers les plus fréquents sont : le cancer de la prostate, du poumon et du côlon ; chez la femme, ce sont : le cancer du sein, du côlon et celui du poumon. 

Bien manger réduit non seulement le risque de développer un cancer mais l'adjonction d'aliments dits "anti cancer" fournit une aide extraordinaire aux cellules de notre corps pour combattre les inflammations et le développement de cellules cancéreuses.

Le cancer peut toucher tous les organes. Il est dû à la multiplication non contrôlée et la mutation de cellules du corps qui finissent par former une tumeur. 

Le plus souvent la cause est inconnue. Mais certains cancers ont des causes précises : une forte exposition au soleil pour le mélanome, à l’amiante pour le cancer de la plèvre, le tabagisme pour le cancer du poumon… 

Non détruites, ces cellules cancéreuses peuvent envahir d’autres organes. On parle alors de métastases. Si le cancer s’étend à plusieurs organes, il s’agit d’un cancer généralisé. 

Le nombre de cancers détectés augmente grâce au perfectionnement des techniques de dépistage ce qui permet une prise en charge plus rapide et de plus grandes chances de guérison.

Le plus souvent les symptômes d’un cancer sont inexistants. Mais on peut observer : 
- Une toux persistante, du sang dans les crachats (cancer du poumon)
- Une voix inhabituellement rauque (cancer de la gorge ou du poumon)
- Des problèmes digestifs persistants (cancer colorectal ou du pancréas)
- Des difficultés à avaler (cancer de l’œsophage)
- Une modification du transit : diarrhée, constipation, sang dans les selles (cancer colorectal)
- Du sang dans les urines (cancer du rein ou de la vessie)
- Une grosseur inhabituelle dans le sein (cancer du sein)

Une palpation, une analyse de sang, une échographie, une radio ou une IRM peuvent permettre de déceler une tumeur. Pour poser le diagnostic une biopsie est nécessaire. 

Pour prévenir un cancer il faut:

- Avoir une alimentation variée et équilibrée
- Pratiquer une activité physique régulière
- Ne pas fumer ni consommer trop d’alcool
- Perdre du poids si vous êtes en surpoids

Le cancer est le mal du siècle. Avoir une bonne hygiène de vie permet d'en réduire les risques, notamment par une alimentation équilibrée et variée. De nombreux aliments possèdent des vertus anticancer. L'ail en fait partie, tout comme l'oignon, l'échalote ou la ciboulette, pour ne citer qu'eux, cette application vous propose de découvrir les aliments de lutte contre le cancer, ainsi que des recommandations alimentaires bien adaptés concernant autant les personnes qui souhaitent prévenir le cancer que celles qui en sont atteintes ou qui souhaitent éviter une récidive.
