ul. Rakovska 128, et. 6
1000 Sofia
Bulgaria
recentChanges:
* Added support for newer devices
* Several bug fixes
comments: Tiny Flashlight seems to have everything but the flashlight. I've have this app on another device and I love it. The flashlight, the temperature and percentage of battery charge are what I use, but on this device it doesn't seem to have the flashlight, that's what I need most on this device. I guess that I will have to Uninstall and choose a different one. Sad.

There are many imposter apps, I only use the original Tiny Flashlight. My favorite feature is the light can be default on when the app icon is tapped, no 2nd tap needed to turn on light when the app opens. I only use the TF: classic widget for this app. I like that widget icon because it looks like a flashlight unlike the widget for Tiny Flashlight. TF widget can be turned on/off from the homescreen without the app opening, TF widget turns the light on/off quicker than the app.

Please somebody recommend me any flashlight app. My phones camera flash is very much brighter than inbuilt torch light. I was using a flashlight app which used camera flashlight ,until recently it is using phones inbuilt light which is pretty dim..i installed this tiny flashlight but the problem is still there ,its giving dim light only. Anybody plzz suggest an app that uses camera flashlight

Unreliable. Fails to turn on my phone's LED more often than it works. It has just one job, and it sucks at it, at least on my phone. Also, ridiculous permissions requirements! Why does a flashlight app have to have: Full network access, Receive data from the Internet, View network connections?
It does what it is purported to do. Using the flash light like a torch. It works better than other more heavier app that I had previously tried. It ist very light in memory used.

title: Bubble Shooter
description:
Classic bubble shoot eliminate shooter game, exquisite picture quality, fun levels, no wifi, free, best time to pass the game!

Welcome to the happy life of a dinosaur mom, cute dragon babies hiding in the depths of bubble jungle, slide your fingers, eliminate colored bubbles, pop, pop, look, baby dragons were you found.

How to play:
- Aim and match the bubble you want to shoot in the bubble.
- Match 3 or more same bubbles.
- Remove bubbles to find cute baby dragons.
- Click on the props in the game, the use of props allows you to easily through the game
- The game will give you the stars based on your performance in the game, the higher the score the more stars
feature:
+ High quality and good music
+ No wifi can play
+ Completely free
+ Well designed level, not only fun but also a lot!

You can download it for free for your girlfriends or old parents.
I wish you a happy life here!

summary: Relaxed and fun bubble shooting game. free!
comments: Yes I enjoy the relaxing game but unfortunately it is interrupted nearly every single advertisement by a still picture advertising a theatrical booking to the point that it is impossible to get rid of, ,the only way is to completely turn off my device and reboot it,,, I'm going to have to delete the game and download something else, ,it's not relaxing anymore, , it's become a chore, ,thank you

So far, I love this. Easy to play,relaxing, short ads! Graphics are sharp, great levels, progressively more difficult. Especially love the little helper dragon who blasts you out of tough blockades, in fact, his little magic wand slowly refills and allows you to blast through rocks over again. This is so much more satisfying, some games arm you with the wrong color bubbles, forcing you to buy bombs. No thank you! So far this is #1 for me great job to this app maker, thank you!

Would've given 5 stars but certain ads (yatze) do not let you exit the ad and continue game play. Have to exit the game and reload. Very annoying. Also, there are some disturbing ads containing sexual content. I have requested these ads be removed numerous times but they keep showing up. I will probably uninstall this app because of this even though I really enjoy playing.

What a great way to pass the time It's a good game for the whole family, easy enough for the younger or inexperienced. And yet it's challenging enough for the more experienced 'gamers'. But most importantly is the fact that my family really enjoy this game which, of course, makes for a more enjoyable game night. We're looking forward to other apps by this same company.

You all have way to many advertisement s and then try and force a person to spend money. Not all people that play these games gamble. This game is the first that I have seen this many advertisements. Turns a person off to something they may have really tried if it hadn't been pushed on them. I'm going to uninstall because you have turned me off to a lot of things. Thank you. Happy sailing.

title: Chronic Disease
description:
Chronic Disease

Chronic illness affects the population worldwide.
Chronic Disease is a long-lasting condition that can be controlled but not cured.,prevention and control,treatment ,medication etc.
Preventing Chronic Disease (PCD) is now available as a free app on your mobile device, bringing you the latest and most relevant peer-reviewed research on public health efforts to prevent chronic disease.
Although chronic diseases are among the most common and costly health problems, they are also among the most preventable and most can be effectively controlled.
Chronic diseases generally cannot be prevented by vaccines or cured by medication, nor do they just disappear.

title: Kids Doodle - Color & Draw Free Game
description:
Kids Doodle, the BEST android drawing app for kids!

Kids Doodle is particularly designed for kids with super easy-to-use painting on photo or canvas. 

It has endless bright colors and 24 beautiful brushes, such as glow, neon, rainbow, crayon and sketchy, etc.

App supports unique "movie" mode, which can play back kid's artwork like a small film. Children love it so much!

The built-in gallery stores both kids drawing picture and drawing procedure. Kids can continue their drawing whenever they want, or "movie" their previous masterpiece anytime they would love.

 GAME FEATURES:
* paint on photo or canvas * 24 brushes, such as glow, neon, fireworks, spark, star, rainbow, crayon, spray, ribbon, etc 
* bright colors
* creative drawing
* built-in art gallery stores both doodle and doodle animation. 
* "movie" mode to play back the drawing like a little film. 
* undo, redo 
* share drawing via Facebook, twitter, instagram, gmail, etc.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rObLR7_Bjec

Share your Art on Kids Doodle Facebook Page
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kids-Doodle/288132957929045

comments: I love this app . And it has no ads. U can do anything u want. This is the best thing. This is the best colour app . All apps have ads . But this isn't . So I am so happy . ❤❤ . And it is my second favorite app . My first favorite app also have ads. U can also take pictures and u can give filters, u can colour it .etc. all people can try it. title: Drive Simulator
description:
Drive over 15 vehicles, operate large cranes and machines, complete easy and complex objectives and explore a large detailed open world environment. Drive simulator 2016 is like no other simulator,  it's the complete simulation package packed with variety of objective based levels such as: 

- Airport: Tow airplane, unload luggage and passengers, refuel plane etc..
- Construction: Demolish and build, transport machinery, operate large cranes etc..
- Depot: Remove and replace vents, transport light goods etc..
- Dockyard: Unload containers, operate large cranes, transport heavy cargo etc..
- Recovery: Recover broken down vehicles   

Features:
- Detailed 3D environment
- Over 15 Vehicles to drive
- 5 different Modes to choose from
- Operate cranes, machines, large trucks, trailers and trolleys
- easy controls

Minimum Requirements: dual core 1.0ghz - 1GB RAM

http://appforgegames.com/privacypolicy.html

comments: This game is the best.It has clear graphics which is my favourite and you can drive properly.The reason why I am giving this 4 stars is because there needs to be a map and there need s to be other SUV like ford ranger,Toyota hilux legend 50,amarok,landcruiser and more.there also has to be long trips like which take 2 hours to get there and some music please fix this problem and then I will give it a 5 star out of and I will follow you on Facebook and Twitter and I will send feedbacks.

This is cool game concept. Benifits include no time pressure. Great camera control, never thought I say it, but a little to touchy. Like many other drive sims, I have an issue with aggressive traffic. Some idot drivers are reality, but I hate that all cars on road,will crash into you if your to slow,and act like you can't get out of the way fast enough. Tone this down and you have a great sim w/great graphics. Just plain fun! After all part of the drive & haul world is being slow. Give it a try!

This game looks like it could be really fun. I've played drive simulators before, so I know the controls can be tricky on a phone, but this game is extremely difficult to control. Plus some have a steering wheel and others have left right buttons. Added 1 star for availability via Play Pass.

Very hard to control...You get stuck on everything.. Camera is very bad you can barely control it...If I was you I wouldn't get it...It's just bad...I would give it a zero star if there was one..I don't even no why it has 4. Stars.. everyone gives it a 2 or 1 star...No hate on the creaters on this game tho....I wouldn't get it if I was you..

The game is Too funny but hard also . The graphics are super but one problem is there the other vehicles are doing to bad . They are trashing to our car . Only this this problem is there.and all are good

title: Stupid Zombies 2
description:
What's a good zombie story without an epic sequel?

The undead return in this new, jam-packed release with exciting, brainless creatures, weapons, puzzles, moody environments all wrapped up in a slick, player-friendly package. They say you can’t kill what is already dead, but it can’t hurt to make a splash by shooting in their general direction.

It is just you vs zombies, so make sure to stop the endless angry hordes before you run out of bullets.

Features:

    Funtastic gameplay, now even better!
    Now with 600 levels.
    Choose between a male and female hero character.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improved performance.
comments: It's fun in the beginning, but gets boring pretty quickly. All the courses seem to be randomly generated, but only between the few different obstacles, so everything is repetitive. The different "courses" you unlock after winning a select number of races seem to only change the color of the road and nothing else. The speed boost that you can achieve is pretty useless since the other racers (cpu) just get telwportef down the map with you. The bonus jump at the end is nice, though.

Well the game is fun, for some time. Unfortunately it becames repetitive and have some problems. First that when you gain boost you fly really fast but the other "players" teleport to you so the boost is useless, then some boost pads on the floor make you go slower for no reason, and then when I was going to rate the game with 3 stars I was redirected to the email so I am giving 2 stars. Overall fun game but gets boring fast.

It's a great game, especially when I'm bored. The only problem is that I've bought all the skins (whatever you call them) for my avatar. I want to have more skins to buy since my virtual coins (that I earned by playing) are over 100k already. It's still very fun though.

In a world of "play to win money" and clan style games its nice to have a simple, one goal game and I have never seen a game like this. It has good graphics, good controls and ita simple but addictive.

This game is alright I have a few problems why when I try to turn in a ball thing I fly off the track and why when I use bost pad I go slow pls fix that and when I speed the BOTs teleport to me and it said I had to reset the game DID YOU KNOW I HAD EVERY THING

description:
* 100,000,000 users across 150 countries.
* Featured by Google Play as Best App & Best Self-Improvement App.

U-Dictionary is a FREE dictionary and translation app. 

U-Dictionary now has official Oxford Dictionaries in 12 languages!

Offline Sentence Translation is also available! Enjoy translating totally offline of 58 languages. 

U-Dictionary takes in originally developed dictionaries, Collins Advanced Dictionary, WordNet Dictionary, Native Examples, Synonyms, Antonyms and so on. It also provides English videos, games and quizzes to help improve your English. 

U-Dictionary is much beyond a simple dictionary! Effortlessly translate texts, pictures, or conversations in 108 languages. It meets all your translation needs, including studying, working and traveling abroad.

title: Animated Atlas of BPH
description:
Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH) - a non-cancerous enlargement of the prostate gland, triggers physiological changes that lead to urination problems in men. 

The Animated Atlas of BPH is a comprehensive collection of videos pertaining to the anatomy and functions of prostate gland, the pathogenesis of prostate enlargement, causes, risk factors, complications, diagnosis, pharmacotherapeutics and surgical treatment for BPH.
descriptionHTML:
Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH) - a non-cancerous enlargement of the prostate gland, triggers physiological changes that lead to urination problems in men.

The Animated Atlas of BPH is a comprehensive collection of videos pertaining to the anatomy and functions of prostate gland, the pathogenesis of prostate enlargement, causes, risk factors, complications, diagnosis, pharmacotherapeutics and surgical treatment for BPH.

title: AdMeTech 19
description:
The Fourth Global Summit on Precision Diagnosis and Treatment of Prostate Cancer is  unique multi-disciplinary forum organized to fill the currently existing gap between the key experts of in vivo imaging; the world authorities in the in vitro fluid- and tissue-based molecular diagnostics, including genomics; and thought leaders in the development of observation strategies (e.g., active surveillance) and novel therapeutic interventions. 

With two days of sessions and more than 40 presenters, extensive panel discussions and “brain trust” meeting, this event’s goal is to educate the key healthcare stakeholders on the current “best practices” and needs in screening, diagnosis, and treatment, and develop consensus on the future vision for precision care strategy for its realization.
descriptionHTML:
The Fourth Global Summit on Precision Diagnosis and Treatment of Prostate Cancer is unique multi-disciplinary forum organized to fill the currently existing gap between the key experts of in vivo imaging; the world authorities in the in vitro fluid- and tissue-based molecular diagnostics, including genomics; and thought leaders in the development of observation strategies (e.g., active surveillance) and novel therapeutic interventions.

With two days of sessions and more than 40 presenters, extensive panel discussions and “brain trust” meeting, this event’s goal is to educate the key healthcare stakeholders on the current “best practices” and needs in screening, diagnosis, and treatment, and develop consensus on the future vision for precision care strategy for its realization.
summary: Mobile Event Guide for AdMeTech 19
recentChanges: -Bug fixes and enhancements to improve the overall attendee app experience.

title: Cleaner - clean the phone, memory, cache & booster
description:
Cleaner - clean the phone, memory, cache & Booster & File manager is one of the best free optimizers for Android devices. Optimize your Android phone and make it fast, easy and convenient.

Key features: removal of garbage and unnecessary files; phone acceleration and cooling, a very convenient file manager; wireless connecting the phone to any device for transferring data; desktop wallpapers and much more!

Garbage removal is cleaning unnecessary files that will help you optimize space on your Smartphone.
Cache clearing is cleaning unnecessary cache files of applications.
Phone acceleration is optimizing the use of memory and speed-up the phone for games and other important programs.
Smartphone cooling is lowering the temperature of the Smartphone and improving device performance.

File Manager will help you quickly and efficiently manage your Smartphone.
Manage files and folders of your SD card.
Save your disk space by saving files to Dropbox, One Drive, etc.
Convenient viewing of images, videos, music, applications, as well as downloaded and favorite files.
Connection of your Smartphone to any Android device without a cable, and transferring data between them.
Viewing photos and videos from your phone on your TV via Wi-fi.
Viewing all programs installed on your device. Interrupting the application’s operation or uninstalling them.
Share music and videos with your friends in two clicks.

Desktop wallpapers will make your phone unique.
You will find only high-quality wallpapers in the Cleaner & File Manager application.
There are thousands of free wallpapers for all phones, in particular for phones with a resolution of 4K, and popular categories and tags to them in this application.

Ease of use and nothing extra, we tried to make the most convenient and simple application for you by having removed all unnecessary things.
